yutongz1997.auto2048.core

Class SearchTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • yutongz1997.auto2048.core.SearchTree

  • public class SearchTree
extends java.lang.Object
    The class of the underlying support for the auto player of this game.
    Author:
    Yutong Zhang

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchTree

        public SearchTree(Board gameBoard,
                  int maximumLevel)
        Constructs a search tree object based on the current game board.
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - the current game board
        maximumLevel - the maximum level / depth of the search tree

    • Method Detail

      • collectLastLevelNodes

        private void collectLastLevelNodes(int maximumLevel)
        Adds all the nodes from the calculated maximum possible level of the search tree (but not exceeds the given maximum level). Again this uses the idea of the breadth first traversal.
        Parameters:
        maximumLevel - the maximum level of nodes to be collected.

      • getHeight

        private int getHeight(SearchTree.SearchTreeNode root)
        Recursively calculates the height of the search tree, i.e. the maximum length of a path from the root to a leaf node.
        Parameters:
        root - the root node
        Returns:
        the height of the search tree

      • nextStep

        public Board nextStep(int steps)
        Iterates through the array list of last level nodes, finds the one with the maximum evaluation and returns the next step's game board using the helper method above.
        Parameters:
        steps - the total steps of the game up to now (which is used to compute the evaluation value of a board)
        Returns:
        the next step's game board

      • nextStep

        private Board nextStep(SearchTree.SearchTreeNode lastLevelNode)
        A helper method that returns the next step's game board by backtracking the parents of a deepest level node level by level.
        Parameters:
        lastLevelNode - a node in the deepest level of the search tree
        Returns:
        the next step's game board
